Your Custom AMI
Instant Duplication
Define your OS, software, and configs once. Save it as an AMI.
Web Server AMI (Nginx + Ubuntu)
Database AMI (PostgreSQL)
AI Training AMI (GPU Drivers)

CPU Power Low
Memory 1 GB
On-Demand Power

Just like choosing a car based on your needs, you select an Instance Type.

  • t2.micro: Perfect for testing (Free Tier)
  • m5.large: Balanced for production apps
  • c5.xlarge: Compute optimized for crunching data

Rent exactly what you need, when you need it.

The AMI
Think of it as a Blueprint. Build once, duplicate instantly.
Your Custom AMI

AMI: The Blueprint

An AMI is the template for your instance. It's a pre-configured OS with software ready to launch.

AMI
Blueprint
→
Instance

Key Concept
of an AMI as the blueprint or template for your instance It s the pre-configured operating system and any software you want...

Ubuntu Linux
Clean slate with the latest version.
Windows Server
Ready to go immediately.

Inbound Rules

HTTP (Port 80): Allow 0.0.0.0/0
HTTPS (Port 443): Allow 0.0.0.0/0

Security Groups

The Digital Bouncer
Allowing web traffic on port 80 or SSH access on port 22 from your specific IP address. If a packet tries to knock on a door you haven't explicitly opened, the Security Group blocks it.
Traffic Control

Key Concept
instances as powerful isolated environments to write and test code without messing up their local machines Businesses use them for big data...

Flexible & Cost-Effective The ultimate flexible computing platform. The best part?

When you're done, you can just terminate the instance and stop paying.

That's the power of the cloud.
$

CALL TO ACTION Don't just watch, DO.

Head over to the AWS Free Tier, create an account, and launch your very own EC2 instance.

Follow a simple tutorial to connect to it.

Launch Free Instance
